title: Apple Releases Urgent Security Updates for iPhone After Hackers Exploit Gaps

title: Meta Sues FTC to Block New Privacy Restrictions Involving Children’s Data
description: A person watches on a smartphone Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg unveiling the META logo in Los Angeles on Oct. 28, 2021. (Chris Delmas/AFP via Getty Images)
